{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Aztec pillar | class = PillarAztec | game = Strife | doomednum = 54 | convid = 211 }}[[Classes]]: PillarAztec
A dark brown stone pillar, covered with "Aztec" symbols. [[Classes:PillarAztecDamaged|Damaged]] and [[Classes:PillarAztecRuined|ruined]] versions of it exist as well. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PillarAztec { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 128 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: STEL A -1 Stop } }
